title: Around what date do the Blood Moon skins come out?
body: So, when Patch 7.3 comes out on February the 8th, it'll feature the Blood Moon skins. These include, Jhin, Diana (rip the meme), Twisted Fate and **TALON**. It got me pretty hyped. So, normally, when do the Blood Moon skins come out?

replies.body: Look to the sky, when the Blood Moon rises, then the skins will release.
There is no specific date on which a skin will be released in a patch (as per usual). Just be assured that they will come out sometime during the patch so be patient ;)
